name: Hearth Fire
description:
Global Game Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/hearth-fire-0

Winter comes. The hearth fire of Cecilie's home is quenched, and her only friend Sheep Lucas is lost in the field.
Cecilie feels cold. She has to find Lucas, as well as a new home to keep them warm.

Tags: Puzzle; Adventure.

Credits (Alphabetical Order):

Clarence Hann: Design/Programming.

Sidan Fan: Design/Art.
